faction.name: astartes
faction.description: The superhuman warriors of the Imperium, known as Space Marines.

faction.name: imperium
faction.description: The galaxy-spanning empire of humanity, ruled by the God-Emperor from the Golden Throne on Terra.

faction.name: chaos
faction.description: The malevolent forces of the Warp, they seek to corrupt and destroy the material universe in service of their dark masters.

faction.name: xenos
faction.description: The myriad alien species that populate the galaxy, each posing a unique threat to the Imperium.
